Blue.D

Korean: 블루디

Country:

Age:

Blood type:

Introduction

Blue.D is an Independent South Korean singer-songwriter. She made her official debut as a soloist on December 2, 2019, with the digital single "Nobody" featuring WINNER's Mino. She used to be under YGX, a subsidiary of YG Entertainment until she left the agency in November 2020.

Prior to her debut, she has featured in Seungri's “Love is You”, WINNER's Mino’s “Um”, GroovyRoom's “This Night” and Sechskies' Eun Jiwon's “I’m on Fire”.
